pullrequest.title: Add ability to enable/disable dynamic lighting of visual

content.raw:
What should the default value be for `Visual::lighting`? In the [sdformat pull request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/79/add-lighting-element-to-visual/diff#Lsdf/1.4/visual.sdfT52), the default value is listed as false, whereas it appears to be set to true in the Visual constructor. Additionally, since you only get the sdf value if it HasElement, it will never use the sdformat default, but instead the one from the Visual constructor.

We should probably have a better way of handling these default values.
